modal.log_level_disk_space_warning: If left on for extended periods of time, can result in excess disk space consumption.

log_level_explanation.debug: Provides debug information about the plugin’s run loop and each individual plugin or other components.
log_level_explanation.info: Provides messages that provide a record of the normal operation of the system.
log_level_explanation.notice: Provides messages that provide a record of the normal operation of the system, but also alerts conditions that may require monitoring. Kong does not make a large difference between info and notice.
log_level_explanation.warn: Is used to log any abnormal behavior that doesn’t result in dropped transactions but requires further investigation.
log_level_explanation.error: Is used for logging errors that result in a request being dropped.
log_level_explanation.crit: Is used when Kong is working under critical conditions and not working properly, thus affecting several clients.
